bosu_squat.name: BOSU Air Squat
bosu_squat.instruction: Stand on dome. Maintain balance. 10-12 reps.

bosu_bridge.name: BOSU Hamstring Bridge
bosu_bridge.instruction: Feet on dome, lift hips, hold 2s. 10 reps.

bosu_sl_bal.name: BOSU SL Balance
bosu_sl_bal.instruction: Single leg balance on dome. 30s per leg, then switch.

bird_dog.name: Bird-Dog (on BOSU)
bird_dog.instruction: Knees on dome. Extend opposite arm/leg, hold 3s. Alternate, 6 per side.

dead_bug.name: Dead Bug
dead_bug.instruction: Opposite arm/leg move. Back glued to floor. Alternate, 8 per side.

plank_hold.name: Forearm Plank
plank_hold.instruction: Keep glutes and core engaged. Hold full duration.

pallof_press.name: Pallof Press
pallof_press.instruction: Hold cable at chest, push out, resist rotation. Do one set facing left, one set facing right. 8 reps per side.

sl_rdl.name: Single-Leg Romanian Deadlift
sl_rdl.instruction: Hinge on one leg, extend other leg back. Complete all reps on one leg, then switch. 8 per leg.

lateral_lunge.name: Weighted Lateral Lunge
lateral_lunge.instruction: Step wide, bend one knee, weight at chest. Alternate sides, 8 per side.

tuck_hold.name: Wall Sit / Tuck Hold
tuck_hold.instruction: Knees at 90Â°, back against wall. Hold full duration.

band_walks.name: Banded Lateral Walks
band_walks.instruction: Band below knees, quarter squat. 10 steps right, then 10 steps left.

90_90_flow.name: 90/90 Hip Flow
90_90_flow.instruction: Sit with legs in 90/90, flow between sides. 6 transitions per side.

single_leg_squat.name: Single-Leg Squat to Bench
single_leg_squat.instruction: Squat on one leg, tap bench with glutes. Complete all reps, then switch. 6 per leg.

fire_hydrant.name: Fire Hydrant
fire_hydrant.instruction: Quadruped, lift bent knee to side. Complete set, then switch. 10 per leg.

knee_to_wall.name: Knee-to-Wall Ankle Stretch
knee_to_wall.instruction: Lunge near wall, drive knee past toes, hold 3s. 8 per ankle.

ankle_edge_drill.name: Ankle Edging Drill
ankle_edge_drill.instruction: Ski stance, roll ankles side to side like edging. Hold each edge 2s. 10 edges total.

shin_raises.name: Shin Raises (AT Raises)
shin_raises.instruction: Heels on step, lift toes high, lower slowly. 15 reps.
